Player History
Injured on 7/7/1966 with a Strained Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 5-6 weeks...
Drafted in 7th round, 123rd overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 1972...
Drafted in 4th round, 79th overall pick, by New York (A) in 1976...
Had first career hit on 7/17/1979, off Barry Lersch (DET)...
Won World Series with New York (A) in 1980...
Hit first career homerun on 6/1/1981, off Mike Caldwell (MIN)...
Injured on 9/29/1985 with a Broken Jaw, out for 4 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 3/2/1987 to a minor league deal...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1987...
